price: Ey Musa! Risaletlerimle ve seninle konuşmamla seni (zamanının) insanları üzerine seçtim; sana verdiğimi al ve şükredenlerden ol! dedi.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي ٱصۡطَفَيۡتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَٰلَٰتِي وَبِكَلَٰمِي فَخُذۡ مَآ ءَاتَيۡتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāmūsā innī iṣ'ṭafaytuka ʿalā al-nāsi birisālātī wabikalāmī fakhudh mā ātaytuka wakun mina al-shākirīna
